entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
